name: Collectivism
description:
My magnum opus. A game with few equals that dissects the inequities not between social classes, but within the social class itself. This game is not for the faint of heart or weak of mind, and it is unclear if any can handle the moral significance it will impart.

[Real talk, now]
This is just a small game I threw together in Unity with a somewhat arbitrary deadline. The code is quite messy, and I'm sure there are still some bugs, but I learned a lot while making it.

WASD controls. W is jump, S is attack.
